list.testifier: The Testimony of a Traveling Buddhist
list.testimony: Since I am a Buddhist priest; I took little notice about her details.
He was wearing a dark blue silk kimono and a large plain sword.

list.testifier: The Testimony of Tajomaru the bandit
list.testimony: I told them there was an old mound in the mountain over there, and that I had dug it open and found many mirrors and swords

list.testifier: The Testimony of Tajomaru the bandit
list.testimony: Just then a puff of wind blew, and raised her hanging scarf, so that I caught a glimpse of her face.
This morning, as usual, I went to cut my daily quota of cedars, when I found the body in a grove in a hollow in the mountains.

list.testifier: The Testimony of Masago the wife
list.testimony: But fortunately my small sword was lying at my feet.
Even now these words threaten to blow me headlong into the bottomless abyss of darkness.
For these words alone I would like to pardon his crime.

list.testifier: The Testimony of a old women
list.testimony: He was of a gende disposition, so I am sure he did nothing to provoke the anger of others.

list.testifier: The Testimony of a old women
list.testimony: What bad luck it is that things should have come to such a sad end!
